message.content:
cs.CR, cs.SD, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.SE

The paper focuses on enhancing the security of smart devices by detecting malicious behavior associated with sensors. This falls under the category of computer security (cs.CR) and software engineering (cs.SE). The paper also utilizes machine learning-based detection mechanisms (cs.AI, cs.LG) and collects data from typical daily activities of users (cs.SD).
